decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (598-101-AL, 598-102-AL, 598-103-AL, 598-104-AL, 598-111-AL, 598-112-AL, 598-120-AL, 598-121-AL Location plan (unnumbered, no date), Block plan (unnumbered, no date). Received on 19 May 2016. 598-141-AL-(02), 598-142-AL-(02), 598-143-AL-(02), 598-144-AL-(02), 598-151-AL-(02), 598-152-AL-(02), 598-160-AL-(02), 598-161-AL-(02). Received on 29 June 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The rooflight approved under this application shall be obscure glazed, and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - The approved side rooflight hereby approved shall not open at an angle that exceeds 20 degrees. Details of how this restriction on the opening would be achieved shall be submitted and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Any subsequent changes to this rooflight shall maintain the opening restriction.
description: Erection of part first floor rear extension and relocation of a rear and side roof window to the house
